hero.description: I design, implement, and deploy web solutions that make people's lives easier.

about.first-paragraph: From a young age, I have been interested in technology. With a strong inclination towards mathematics and computer science, I graduated in Computer Science from the <1>Faculty of Mathematics and Information Science at the Warsaw University of Technology</1>. Programming is my passion, and implementing new and interesting solutions brings me great satisfaction.
about.second-paragraph: Professionally, I specialize in developing web applications in the .NET environment, both on the backend and frontend. I have completed numerous projects that are used by hundreds of thousands of people. I focus on process optimization and creating efficient code. Cybersecurity is also a keen interest of mine, and I strive to maintain high standards in this field within my solutions.
about.third-paragraph: In my projects, I prioritize containerization and manage my own <0>Kubernetes</0> cluster. Currently, I am working on creating a web service called <1>Pan Rachunek</1>, which enables expense management.
about.fourth-paragraph: When I'm not at the computer, I dedicate my time to my hobby, which is triathlon, specifically training for the full Ironman distance.

pan-rachunek.description: I have designed and implemented a multi-tier system for collecting user expense data. The application utilizes machine learning for recognizing products from receipt images. In the architecture of the solution, I have utilized an OAuth 2.0 compliant authentication server - <1>IdentityServer.</1>

luxmed.description: At LUX MED, along with my team, I have completed numerous projects related to diagnostic imaging that are utilized by patients, doctors, and medical facility staff throughout Poland. In addition to developing application code, I also served as a SQL programmer and ensured the creation of efficient SQL code in the solutions. I have conducted several system migrations, both in terms of data and technology.

datapolis.description: At Datapolis, I familiarized myself with the SharePoint Framework, which is utilized by the company's product for managing business processes of various organizations. I successfully optimized the deployment process of this application, significantly accelerating the installation at client sites by several times.
